definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: Your attention please, passenger to Hang Hau and Po Lam, please change train at this station.
sentences.chinese: 請注意，前往坑口及寶林的乘客，請系本站轉車。

sentences.english: Tang Baolin is a well-known scholar in the realm of contemporary history of China.
sentences.chinese: 唐寶林是中國現代史領域的知名學者。

sentences.english: Thanks Mr. Xue Baolin for giving us a speech.
sentences.chinese: 感謝中遠集團船員代表薛寶林的講話。
張寶林興奮地告訴記者。

sentences.english: Hou, the son of crosstalk master Hou Baolin, had learnt crosstalk since he was young.
sentences.chinese: 侯耀文是相聲大師侯寶林的兒子，從小就學習相聲。
